front.title: A Comparison of Proposals to Replace NAT-PT

abstract.t: As we approach IPv4 address depletion, the IETF must provide for IPv4and IPv6 coexistence: a way for ISPs and enterprises to reducepublic IPv4 address consumption and a way for hosts to migrate toIPv6 connectivity -- while providing reasonable access for those IPv6hosts to access the IPv4 Internet.This draft compares eight proposals for IPv6 and IPv4 coexistence.
